The Wolf's Cookbook

Food By Geeks, For Geeks

Here you can find the recipes that are loved and used regularly by @dshadowwolf and his friends online.

Contents

  1. One Pot Meals
    Meals that can be cooked in a single pot
    • "Curry, American Style"
      • A custom take on the classic Indian dish
    • Cajun Dirty Rice
      • My own version of this classic Cajun dish
    • Ground Beef Tacos
      • A somewhat complex take on a relatively simple classic
    • Sausage Gravy
      • Simple, but something people seem to have trouble with
  2. Soups and Pasta
    Various soup and pasta recipes
    • Beef Ramen
      • A Japanese classic that long ago spread to the rest of the planet
  3. Special Equipment Needed
    Recipes that need special equipment, such as waffle irons
    • Classic Waffles
      • Requires: Waffle Iron
